Plot hodograph based on rawinsonde data

Source: R/sounding_hodograph.R
sounding_hodograph.Rd

Plot rawinsonde hodograph to show changes in wind speed and direction with height

sounding_hodograph(
  ws,
  wd,
  altitude,
  max_hght = 12000,
  max_speed = 25,
  lab_hghts = c(0, 1, 3, 6, 9, 12),
  ...
)

Arguments

ws

wind speed [knots]
wd

wind direction [azimuth in degrees]
altitude

altitude [m] (can be above sea level or above ground level as function always consider first level as surface, i.e h = 0 m) altitude [m]
max_hght

maximum altitude [km] to be considered on the hodograph, 12 km used by default
max_speed

displayed range of the drawn hodograph [m/s], 25 m/s used as default
lab_hghts

height labels [km] to be drawn on the hodograph, 0, 1, 3, 6, 9, 12 used by default; NULL for skipping labels
...

other graphical parameters to be used with plot() function

Value

hodograph plot

Examples

chanhassen = get_sounding(wmo_id = 72649, yy = 2001, mm = 5, dd = 10, hh = 00)

#> [1] "http://weather.uwyo.edu/cgi-bin/sounding?region=europe&TYPE=TEXT%3ALIST&YEAR=2001&MONTH=05&FROM=1000&TO=1000&STNM=72649"
#> /var/folders/lw/3fnnk87n4q1dkl35s2_p24h80000gn/T//RtmpHkS0Gi/filec921ce88d47
sounding_hodograph(ws = chanhassen$ws, wd = chanhassen$wd, 
                   altitude = chanhassen$altitude,max_speed = 40)

title("Chanhasses - 10 May 2001, 00:00 UTC")
